court","_intercourtTokens":"Intercourt tokens (order and length must match _limits array)","_limits":"Limit values to add (order and length must match _intercourtTokens array)"}},"balanceOf(address,uint256)":{"params":{"_id":"ID of the Token","_owner":"The address of the token holder"},"return":"The _owner's balance of the Token type requested"},"balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[])":{"params":{"_ids":"ID of the Tokens","_owners":"The addresses of the token holders"},"return":"The _owner's balance of the Token types requested (i.e. balance for each (owner, id) pair)"},"batchBurnFrom(address,uint256[],uint256[],bytes)":{"details":"Caller must be approved to manage the tokens being transferred out of the `_from` account (see \"Approval\" section of the standard). MUST revert if length of `_ids` is not the same as length of `_values`. MUST revert on any other error. MUST emit `TransferSingle` or `TransferBatch` event(s) such that all the balance changes are reflected. Balance changes and events MUST follow the ordering of the arrays (_ids[0]/_values[0] before _ids[1]/_values[1], etc).","params":{"_data":"Additional data with no specified format, MUST be sent unaltered in call to the `ERC1155TokenReceiver` hook(s) on `_to`","_from":"Source address","_ids":"IDs of each token type (order and length must match _values array)","_values":"Transfer amounts per token type (order and length must match _ids array)"}},"batchMintFrom(address,address,uint256[],uint256[],bytes)":{"details":"Caller must be approved to manage the tokens being transferred out of the `_from` account (see \"Approval\" section of the standard). MUST revert if `_to` is the zero address. MUST revert if length of `_ids` is not the same as length of `_values`. MUST revert on any other error. MUST emit `TransferSingle` or `TransferBatch` event(s) such that all the balance changes are reflected. Balance changes and events MUST follow the ordering of the arrays (_ids[0]/_values[0] before _ids[1]/_values[1], etc). After the above conditions for the transfer(s) in the batch are met, this function MUST check if `_to` is a smart contract (e.g. code size > 0). If so, it MUST call the relevant `ERC1155TokenReceiver` hook(s) on `_to` and act appropriately (see \"Safe Transfer Rules\" section of the standard).","params":{"_data":"Additional data with no specified format, MUST be sent unaltered in call to the `ERC1155TokenReceiver` hook(s) on `_to`","_from":"Source address","_ids":"IDs of each token type (order and length must match _values array)","_to":"Target address","_values":"Transfer amounts per token type (order and length must match _ids array)"}},"burnFrom(address,uint256,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Caller must be approved to manage the tokens being transferred out of the `_from` account (see \"Approval\" section of the standard). MUST revert on any other error. MUST emit the `TransferSingle` event to reflect the balance change.","params":{"_data":"Additional data with no specified format, MUST be sent unaltered in call to `onERC1155Received` on `_to`","_from":"Source address","_id":"ID of the token type","_value":"Transfer amount"}},"createCourt()":{"return":"Court ID"},"createIntercourtToken()":{"return":"Intercourt token"},"createLimitCourt(uint256)":{"params":{"_court":"Base (limit or non-limit) court"},"return":"Limit court ID"},"getFinalCourt(uint256)":{"params":{"_court":"Court ID to start with"},"return":"Non-limit court ID"},"getTrustedCourtsList(uint256)":{"params":{"_truster":"Court"}},"intercourtTransfer(address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256[],bytes)":{"params":{"_courtsPath":"Through which courts to transfer","_data":"Additional data with no specified format, MUST be sent unaltered in call to `onERC1155Received` on `_to`","_from":"Source address","_intercourtToken":"Intercourt token","_to":"Target address","_value":"Transfer amount"}},"intercourtTransferBatch(address,address,uint256[],uint256[],uint256[],bytes)":{"params":{"_courtsPath":"Through which courts to transfer","_data":"Additional data with no specified format, MUST be sent unaltered in call to `onERC1155Received` on `_to`","_from":"Source address","_intercourtTokens":"Intercourt tokens (order and length must match _values array)","_to":"Target address","_values":"Transfer amounts per token type (order and length must match _intercourtTokens array)"}},"isApprovedForAll(address,address)":{"params":{"_operator":"Address of authorized operator","_owner":"The owner of the Tokens"},"return":"True if the operator is approved, false if not"},"isLimitCourt(uint256)":{"params":{"_court":"Court ID"},"return":"True if it is a limit court"},"mintFrom(address,address,uint256,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Caller must be approved to manage the tokens being transferred out of the `_from` account (see \"Approval\" section of the standard). MUST revert if `_to` is the zero address. MUST revert on any other error. MUST emit the `TransferSingle` event to reflect the balance change. After the above conditions are met, this function MUST check if `_to` is a smart contract (e.g. code size > 0). If so, it MUST call `onERC1155Received` on `_to` and act appropriately (see \"Safe Transfer Rules\" section of the standard).","params":{"_data":"Additional data with no specified format, MUST be sent unaltered in call to `onERC1155Received` on `_to`","_from":"Source address","_id":"ID of the token type","_to":"Target address","_value":"Transfer amount"}},"safeBatchTransferFrom(address,address,uint256[],uint256[],bytes)":{"details":"Caller must be approved to manage the tokens being transferred out of the `_from` account (see \"Approval\" section of the standard). MUST revert if `_to` is the zero address. MUST revert if length of `_ids` is not the same as length of `_values`. MUST revert if any of the balance(s) of the holder(s) for token(s) in `_ids` is lower than the respective amount(s) in `_values` sent to the recipient. MUST revert on any other error. MUST emit `TransferSingle` or `TransferBatch` event(s) such that all the balance changes are reflected (see \"Safe Transfer Rules\" section of the standard). Balance changes and events MUST follow the ordering of the arrays (_ids[0]/_values[0] before _ids[1]/_values[1], etc). After the above conditions for the transfer(s) in the batch are met, this function MUST check if `_to` is a smart contract (e.g. code size > 0). If so, it MUST call the relevant `ERC1155TokenReceiver` hook(s) on `_to` and act appropriately (see \"Safe Transfer Rules\" section of the standard).","params":{"_data":"Additional data with no specified format, MUST be sent unaltered in call to the `ERC1155TokenReceiver` hook(s) on `_to`","_from":"Source address","_ids":"IDs of each token type (order and length must match _values array)","_to":"Target address","_values":"Transfer amounts per token type (order and length must match _ids array)"}},"safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Caller must be approved to manage the tokens being transferred out of the `_from` account (see \"Approval\" section of the standard). MUST revert if `_to` is the zero address. MUST revert if balance of holder for token `_id` is lower than the `_value` sent. MUST revert on any other error. MUST emit the `TransferSingle` event to reflect the balance change (see \"Safe Transfer Rules\" section of the standard). After the above conditions are met, this function MUST check if `_to` is a smart contract (e.g. code size > 0). If so, it MUST call `onERC1155Received` on `_to` and act appropriately (see \"Safe Transfer Rules\" section of the standard).","params":{"_data":"Additional data with no specified format, MUST be sent unaltered in call to `onERC1155Received` on `_to`","_from":"Source address","_id":"ID of the token type","_to":"Target address","_value":"Transfer amount"}},"setApprovalForAll(address,bool)":{"details":"MUST emit the ApprovalForAll event on success.","params":{"_approved":"True if the operator is approved, false to revoke approval","_operator":"Address to add to the set of authorized operators"}},"setCourtLimits(uint256,uint256[],uint256[])":{"params":{"_courtId":"The court","_intercourtTokens":"Intercourt tokens (order and length must match _limits array)","_limits":"New limits (order and length must match _intercourtTokens array)"}},"setOwner(uint256,address)":{"params":{"_court":"Court","_owner":"New owner"}},"trustCourts(uint256,uint256[])":{"params":{"_trustees":"The trustee courts to add","_truster":"The truster court"}},"untrustCourts(uint256,uint256[])":{"params":{"_trustees":"The trustee courts to remove","_truster":"The truster court"}}}},"userdoc":{"methods":{"addToCourtLimits(uint256,uint256[],uint256[])":{"notice":"Add to remaining court trust limits."},"balanceOf(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Get the balance of an account's Tokens."},"balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[])":{"notice":"Get the balance of multiple account/token pairs"},"batchBurnFrom(address,uint256[],uint256[],bytes)":{"notice":"Burns `_values` amount(s) of `_ids` from the `_from` address specified (with safety call)."},"batchMintFrom(address,address,uint256[],uint256[],bytes)":{"notice":"Mints `_values` amount(s) of `_ids` from the `_from` address to the `_to` address specified (with safety call)."},"burnFrom(address,uint256,uint256,bytes)":{"notice":"Burns `_value` amount of an `_id` from the `_from` address specified (with safety call)."},"createCourt()":{"notice":"Create a regular court."},"createIntercourtToken()":{"notice":"Create an intercourt token."},"createLimitCourt(uint256)":{"notice":"Create a limit court."},"getFinalCourt(uint256)":{"notice":"Get final (non-limit) court in a chain of courts."},"getTrustedCourtsList(uint256)":{"notice":"Get `trustedCourtsList` for a court."},"intercourtTransfer(address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256[],bytes)":{"notice":"Transfer money through several courts with automatic currency conversion between court tokens."},"intercourtTransferBatch(address,address,uint256[],uint256[],uint256[],bytes)":{"notice":"Transfer money through several courts with automatic currency conversion between court tokens."},"isApprovedForAll(address,address)":{"notice":"Queries the approval status of an operator for a given owner."},"isLimitCourt(uint256)":{"notice":"Check if given court ID corresponds to a limit court."},"mintFrom(address,address,uint256,uint256,bytes)":{"notice":"Mints `_value` amount of an `_id` from the `_from` address to the `_to` address specified (with safety call)."},"safeBatchTransferFrom(address,address,uint256[],uint256[],bytes)":{"notice":"Transfers `_values` amount(s) of `_ids` from the `_from` address to the `_to` address specified (with safety call)."},"safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256,uint256,bytes)":{"notice":"Transfers `_value` amount of an `_id` from the `_from` address to the `_to` address specified (with safety call)."},"setApprovalForAll(address,bool)":{"notice":"Enable or disable approval for a third party (\"operator\") to manage all of the caller's tokens."},"setCourtLimits(uint256,uint256[],uint256[])":{"notice":"Set remaining court trust limits."},"setOwner(uint256,address)":{"notice":"Set court owner."},"trustCourts(uint256,uint256[])":{"notice":"Trust these courts."},"untrustCourts(uint256,uint256[])":{"notice":"Do not trust these courts anymore."}}}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"/home/porton/Projects/courts/contracts/RewardCourts.sol":"RewardCourts"},"evmVersion":"byzantium","libraries":{},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":10000},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"/home/porton/Projects/courts/contracts/Address.sol":{"keccak256":"0xdb09e2900804fd719889bda2d4417302cf59890e46763aeab7f1c903903a38f6","urls":["bzzr://eaf713dd91ba14c78b1bff397b153694e070c84abfc626b61088cfc85fa0cdf1"]},"/home/porton/Projects/courts/contracts/Common.sol":{"keccak256":"0x999e85d8edf6840e7700f6ea4612caffcac959a0afcc6e12f5b060111942c2db","urls":["bzzr://4be8db106e5d51ef80bb85ab1421e03dca34527be01fcc7f546dc9245b1f6f82"]},"/home/porton/Projects/courts/contracts/ERC165.sol":{"keccak256":"0x985227ca7c58debabf304826b08f8772fb7830d1b6bcf90d33ebcc7c712f67a1","urls":["bzzr://31fba66320d6929a3deb9ac76c354b19ee149eff57718eabb6bba1d92f021483"]},"/home/porton/Projects/courts/contracts/IERC1155.sol":{"keccak256":"0x32f3e1b102418586e39478f626c1ae4844dc82cb83b82a0b635dd1e5aafbb038","urls":["bzzr://a4ff87192410b0c61a7779de9b591ccd0aec5dce18bbb79ec468efd8bc7776d5"]},"/home/porton/Projects/courts/contracts/IERC1155TokenReceiver.sol":{"keccak256":"0xeecd362617a15d247b45408017fda83aea2863412d229bd853dc32ecf12518a3","urls":["bzzr://2ded57a7007d35b1f168b130a4e24066d84b8fbe5daa87250917d61218e14604"]},"/home/porton/Projects/courts/contracts/RewardCourts.sol":{"keccak256":"0x1fd895373bc0b116b336674436cd703f99584ed78a2f8a567174a8164f51117a","urls":["bzzr://25ad3418113da03bf12a8c7aee1233ace3b06d6d2b534b27dc2f6177356c24b4"]},"@aragon/os/contracts/lib/math/SafeMath.sol":{"keccak256":"0x2e11c8dcead82c452ef452f4dbced40e20ae105fa4145d920dac6e077b31d846","urls":["bzzr://91dbd0e3335720d4a3d12a90682b8d9834f76e75918c1f646a84debb38089ece"]}},"version":1}

params._intercourtTokens: Intercourt tokens (order and length must match _limits array)
params._limits: Limit values to add (order and length must match _intercourtTokens array)

params._owner: The address of the token holder

balanceOf(address,uint256).return: The _owner's balance of the Token type requested

params._owners: The addresses of the token holders

balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[]).return: The _owner's balance of the Token types requested (i.e. balance for each (owner, id) pair)

batchBurnFrom(address,uint256[],uint256[.details: Caller must be approved to manage the tokens being transferred out of the `_from` account (see "Approval" section of the standard). MUST revert if length of `_ids` is not the same as length of `_values`. MUST revert on any other error. MUST emit `TransferSingle` or `TransferBatch` event(s) such that all the balance changes are reflected. Balance changes and events MUST follow the ordering of the arrays (_ids[0]/_values[0] before _ids[1]/_values[1], etc).

params._data: Additional data with no specified format, MUST be sent unaltered in call to the `ERC1155TokenReceiver` hook(s) on `_to`
params._ids: IDs of each token type (order and length must match _values array)
params._values: Transfer amounts per token type (order and length must match _ids array)

batchMintFrom(address,address,uint256[],.details: Caller must be approved to manage the tokens being transferred out of the `_from` account (see "Approval" section of the standard). MUST revert if `_to` is the zero address. MUST revert if length of `_ids` is not the same as length of `_values`. MUST revert on any other error. MUST emit `TransferSingle` or `TransferBatch` event(s) such that all the balance changes are reflected. Balance changes and events MUST follow the ordering of the arrays (_ids[0]/_values[0] before _ids[1]/_values[1], etc). After the above conditions for the transfer(s) in the batch are met, this function MUST check if `_to` is a smart contract (e.g. code size > 0). If so, it MUST call the relevant `ERC1155TokenReceiver` hook(s) on `_to` and act appropriately (see "Safe Transfer Rules" section of the standard).

params._data: Additional data with no specified format, MUST be sent unaltered in call to the `ERC1155TokenReceiver` hook(s) on `_to`
params._ids: IDs of each token type (order and length must match _values array)
params._values: Transfer amounts per token type (order and length must match _ids array)

burnFrom(address,uint256,uint256,bytes).details: Caller must be approved to manage the tokens being transferred out of the `_from` account (see "Approval" section of the standard). MUST revert on any other error. MUST emit the `TransferSingle` event to reflect the balance change.

params._data: Additional data with no specified format, MUST be sent unaltered in call to `onERC1155Received` on `_to`
Additional data with no specified format, MUST be sent unaltered in call to `onERC1155Received` on `_to`
Additional data with no specified format, MUST be sent unaltered in call to `onERC1155Received` on `_to`
params._intercourtTokens: Intercourt tokens (order and length must match _values array)
params._values: Transfer amounts per token type (order and length must match _intercourtTokens array)

isApprovedForAll(address,address).return: True if the operator is approved, false if not

isLimitCourt(uint256).return: True if it is a limit court

mintFrom(address,address,uint256,uint256.details: Caller must be approved to manage the tokens being transferred out of the `_from` account (see "Approval" section of the standard). MUST revert if `_to` is the zero address. MUST revert on any other error. MUST emit the `TransferSingle` event to reflect the balance change. After the above conditions are met, this function MUST check if `_to` is a smart contract (e.g. code size > 0). If so, it MUST call `onERC1155Received` on `_to` and act appropriately (see "Safe Transfer Rules" section of the standard).

params._data: Additional data with no specified format, MUST be sent unaltered in call to `onERC1155Received` on `_to`

safeBatchTransferFrom(address,address,ui.details: Caller must be approved to manage the tokens being transferred out of the `_from` account (see "Approval" section of the standard). MUST revert if `_to` is the zero address. MUST revert if length of `_ids` is not the same as length of `_values`. MUST revert if any of the balance(s) of the holder(s) for token(s) in `_ids` is lower than the respective amount(s) in `_values` sent to the recipient. MUST revert on any other error. MUST emit `TransferSingle` or `TransferBatch` event(s) such that all the balance changes are reflected (see "Safe Transfer Rules" section of the standard). Balance changes and events MUST follow the ordering of the arrays (_ids[0]/_values[0] before _ids[1]/_values[1], etc). After the above conditions for the transfer(s) in the batch are met, this function MUST check if `_to` is a smart contract (e.g. code size > 0). If so, it MUST call the relevant `ERC1155TokenReceiver` hook(s) on `_to` and act appropriately (see "Safe Transfer Rules" section of the standard).

params._data: Additional data with no specified format, MUST be sent unaltered in call to the `ERC1155TokenReceiver` hook(s) on `_to`
params._ids: IDs of each token type (order and length must match _values array)
params._values: Transfer amounts per token type (order and length must match _ids array)

safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256.details: Caller must be approved to manage the tokens being transferred out of the `_from` account (see "Approval" section of the standard). MUST revert if `_to` is the zero address. MUST revert if balance of holder for token `_id` is lower than the `_value` sent. MUST revert on any other error. MUST emit the `TransferSingle` event to reflect the balance change (see "Safe Transfer Rules" section of the standard). After the above conditions are met, this function MUST check if `_to` is a smart contract (e.g. code size > 0). If so, it MUST call `onERC1155Received` on `_to` and act appropriately (see "Safe Transfer Rules" section of the standard).

params._data: Additional data with no specified format, MUST be sent unaltered in call to `onERC1155Received` on `_to`

setApprovalForAll(address,bool).details: MUST emit the ApprovalForAll event on success.

params._approved: True if the operator is approved, false to revoke approval
params._operator: Address to add to the set of authorized operators

params._intercourtTokens: Intercourt tokens (order and length must match _limits array)
params._limits: New limits (order and length must match _intercourtTokens array)

addToCourtLimits(uint256,uint256[],uint2.notice: Add to remaining court trust limits.

balanceOf(address,uint256).notice: Get the balance of an account's Tokens.

balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[]).notice: Get the balance of multiple account/token pairs

batchBurnFrom(address,uint256[],uint256[.notice: Burns `_values` amount(s) of `_ids` from the `_from` address specified (with safety call).

batchMintFrom(address,address,uint256[],.notice: Mints `_values` amount(s) of `_ids` from the `_from` address to the `_to` address specified (with safety call).

burnFrom(address,uint256,uint256,bytes).notice: Burns `_value` amount of an `_id` from the `_from` address specified (with safety call).

getFinalCourt(uint256).notice: Get final (non-limit) court in a chain of courts.

intercourtTransfer(address,address,uint2.notice: Transfer money through several courts with automatic currency conversion between court tokens.

intercourtTransferBatch(address,address,.notice: Transfer money through several courts with automatic currency conversion between court tokens.

isApprovedForAll(address,address).notice: Queries the approval status of an operator for a given owner.

isLimitCourt(uint256).notice: Check if given court ID corresponds to a limit court.

mintFrom(address,address,uint256,uint256.notice: Mints `_value` amount of an `_id` from the `_from` address to the `_to` address specified (with safety call).

safeBatchTransferFrom(address,address,ui.notice: Transfers `_values` amount(s) of `_ids` from the `_from` address to the `_to` address specified (with safety call).

safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256.notice: Transfers `_value` amount of an `_id` from the `_from` address to the `_to` address specified (with safety call).

setApprovalForAll(address,bool).notice: Enable or disable approval for a third party ("operator") to manage all of the caller's tokens.

untrustCourts(uint256,uint256[]).notice: Do not trust these courts anymore.
